General.Name: Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co
General.Description: Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides banking services in the People's Republic of China. It operates in three segments: Corporate Banking, Personal Banking, and Financial Market Business. The Corporate Banking segment offers current accounts, deposits, overdrafts, loans, and trade-related products, as well as engages in foreign currency and other credit services. This segment serves corporates, government agencies, and financial institutions. The Personal Banking segment credit and debit cards, payment settlement, savings deposits, personal loans payment, agency funds and insurance related services. The Financial Market Business segment engages in money market or repurchase transaction services. It operates branches, including the head office and the business department, branches, first-class sub-branches, second-class sub-branches, community sub-branches, and branch offices, as well as self-service 24-hour banking centers. Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.
